nodes.text: Pearl was the name of female Mantellian flutterplume owned by the Ravagers Captain during the Coratanni during the Galactic War. In 3637 BBY a group of individuals hired by Coratanni's predecessor Ruugar stormed the ship Pearl's Girl, named after the flutterplume, and killed both Coratanni and her pet after a prolonged fight.
Pearl appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
